name: One way trip (itch)
description:
INFO
Fisherman finds a strange diary on an abandoned cruise ship. What happened to the crew and passengers?

CONTROLS

- Use mouse for every interaction

- Inventory can be found in the top left corner of the screen, when your cursor is there

DEVELOPERS

Music - RufFeji https://itch.io/profile/ruffeji

Art - dnsatan https://dnsatan.itch.io

Narrative design - CarmineOrthus https://carmineorthus.itch.io

Coding - Fairycatto https://fairycatto.itch.io

game was made with the help of Adventure creator!
